name: Avoid Artifacts with too many parameters (SQL)
description: Avoid artifacts with more than X parameters. The threshold X is a parameter and it can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all artifacts with more than X parameters. It provides the following information:
 Artifact full name, number of parameters
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, artifacts should not have too many parameters.
remediation: Review the design of the artifacts to reduce the number of parameters.
total: Number of Artifacts with SQL code.

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity

qualityStandards.name: Excessive parameterization
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where a function, method, procedure, stored procedure, sub-routine, etc. has too many parameters in its signature (default threshold value for the maximum number of parameters is 7)
